definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: They lower cholesterol and are recommended for prevention against atherosclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 低胆固醇含量有助于阻止动脉硬化。

sentences.english: Frequently drinking persimmon leaf tea can help lower blood pressure and treat hardening of the arteries.
sentences.chinese: 经常饮用柿叶茶可以有效降低血压，治疗动脉硬化。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effects of rehabilitation and nursing care for arteriosclerosis obliterans.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察闭塞性动脉硬化症康复护理的效果。

sentences.english: These substances could possibly play a role in the prevention and cure of thrombosis and arteriosclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 这种物质有防治血栓病和动脉硬化的功效。

sentences.english: It is also helpful with lowering cholesterol and slow hardening of arteries.
sentences.chinese: 此外，它还有助于降低胆固醇和减缓动脉硬化。

sentences.english: Objective To assess the relationship between cornea arcus senilis and blood fat & arteriosclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨角膜老年环与血脂及动脉硬化的关系。

sentences.english: Lecithin helps ease the problem of the hardening of the arteries, which often impairs brain functioning.
sentences.chinese: 卵磷脂有助于减轻常影响大脑功能的动脉硬化问题。

sentences.english: Aim To study the relationship of ankle brachial index, atherosclerosis and conventional risk factors.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解踝臂指数与动脉硬化及其危险因素的关系。

sentences.english: Objective To study the nursing measures for the interventional therapy of arteriosclerotic obliteration.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究下肢动脉硬化性闭塞症介入治疗的护理方法。

sentences.english: Gum problems increase the risk of atherosclerosis.
sentences.chinese: 牙龈问题增加动脉硬化的风险。

sentences.english: This disease is caused by hardening of arteries in the macula, the light-sensitive tissue in the center of the retina.
sentences.chinese: 引发这种疾病的是视网膜中央光敏组织黄斑动脉硬化。

sentences.english: If you can't reach your toes, you may be at increased risk for arterial stiffness.
sentences.chinese: 如果你够不到脚趾，动脉硬化的风险就有可能增加。

sentences.english: What fruit can old people arteriosclerosis eat?
sentences.chinese: 老年人动脉硬化可以吃什么水果呢？

pinyin: dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4
xue4 guan3 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4
